programme.title: In The Land Of The Moose
programme.desc: Follow the story of a moose mother fiercely defending her calf from danger

programme.title: Otters: River Masters of Yellowstone
programme.desc: Follow two families of river otters in Yellowstone and how they join together to face small challenges.

programme.title: The Horse Tamer With Pat Parelli
programme.desc: Chester, a top carriage driver, is struggling with his powerful horse, Kasper, whose strong will and impatience could put the team at risk.

programme.title: The Horse Tamer With Pat Parelli
programme.desc: Grace bought her quarterhorse Bella specifically for riding, but Bella doesn't seem to want anyone to ride. Pat is here to help Grace and to make Bella feel safer for generations of Grace's family.

programme.title: One In A Thousand
programme.desc: One in a Thousand' portrays the diverse wildlife inside a stream.

programme.title: Biebrza - The European Amazon
programme.desc: A unique story about Biebrza - the European Amazon

programme.title: Germany's Underworld
programme.sub-title: From the Alps to the River Rhine
programme.desc: In this episode, we meet powerful hunters like the pike and sinister meat-eating plants like the bladderwort.

programme.title: Germany's Underworld
programme.sub-title: From the Harz Mountain to the North Sea
programme.desc: In this episode meet the ancient Atlantic sturgeon, the ground beetle, the sea eagle, and a family of beavers.

programme.title: Germany's Mystic Forest
programme.desc: Explore impenetrable forests, caves, rivers, and wild landscapes. Discover diverse wildlife like wolves, deer, and rare species in Germany's Wild Amazon.

programme.title: Germany's Wild Wolves
programme.desc: Germany's Wild Wolves challenges modern myths about wolves, revealing their social structures

programme.title: Swimming With Legends
programme.desc: Fred Boyle, a free diver, shares his father's passion, using a mirror to spot ocean giants and study them.

programme.title: Swimming With Legends
programme.desc: Fred, a marine biologist, studies whale sharks in Indonesia, aiding a global survey while managing fears.

programme.title: In The Land Of The Moose
programme.desc: Follow the story of a moose mother fiercely defending her calf from danger

programme.title: The Horse Tamer With Pat Parelli
programme.desc: Pat is helping Petunia, a mustang previously neglected. She won't allow anyone to get close to her, which gets in the way of her care and hygene. Pat works with Lisa to improve Petunia's way of life.

programme.title: The Horse Tamer With Pat Parelli
programme.desc: Pat meets with Mary, who has had her horse Milo for 3 years. Mary was told that he was rideable, but that turned out not to be the case. Milo is smart, but also unpredictable and Mary needs some help.

programme.title: The Horse Tamer With Pat Parelli
programme.desc: Pat meets with Lindy and 8 year old Sedona. Sedona has recently become more dominant, pushy, and uncooperative, making him feel unsafe for Lindy to ride. Pat hopes to help Lindy feel confident again.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Great White Shark
programme.desc: Sharks: Ancient guardians of the ocean now face extinction. It's time to fight for their survival.

programme.title: Sharks (3D)
programme.desc: 3D images of white, hammerhead, and whale sharks highlight their survival skills and long ocean presence.

programme.title: Ibex: Acrobats On The Rocks
programme.desc: The film follows Buck, an Alpine Ibex from Italy's Gran Paradiso, highlighting his life and majestic beauty.

programme.title: Grizzly Country
programme.desc: This documentary reveals some of the most astonishing behaviors of Grizzly bears.

programme.title: Hunters Of The Skies
programme.desc: Hawks, buzzards, and eagles are powerful birds with diverse hunting strategies, conquering various habitats

programme.title: The Real Lost World
programme.desc: Follow a team of adventurers on an epic journey to the plateau of Roraima, Venezuela, to The Real Lost World.

programme.title: Seasons Of The Otter
programme.desc: After a year of care, two otter pups must soon fend for themselves and start families of their own.

programme.title: White Wolf
programme.desc: Filmed in Yellowstone National Park, this film follows the packs of two rare alpha female White Wolves.

programme.desc: Filmed in Yellowstone National Park, this film follows the packs of two rare alpha female White Wolves.

programme.title: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: The California Condor population faced extinction in the 1980s until biologists allied with hunters to investigate the cause of these magnificent birds' death.
